oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Mel Tillis interview
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of an interview with Mel Tillis (performer), conducted by an unidentified female interviewer.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: [Unidentified] asks about Mel Tillis upcoming autobiography -- Mel Tillis talks about his book possibly being a part one of many -- Tillis says that he was approached by a publisher to do the book -- Tillis talks about doing some editing on the book himself -- Tillis talks about growing up in Florida and catching malaria as a young kid, stories of which are included in the book -- Tillis talks about an upcoming film -- Tillis talks about an upcoming album, which will be his 53rd album -- [Unidentified] concludes the interview
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Tillis, Mel;
